org.testfx.util

Class ColorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testfx.util.ColorUtils

  • public final class ColorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains Color utility methods.
    See Also:
    Named Colors

    • Method Detail

      • getClosestNamedColor

        public static java.lang.String getClosestNamedColor(java.lang.String hexString)
        Get the color name of the color that is closest to the given hex color value (as a 6-digit hex String).
        Parameters:
        hexString - the String containing 6 hex-digits representing a color value ("000000" to "FFFFFF")
        Returns:
        the name of the color that is the closest to the given hex String color value

      • getNamedColor

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getNamedColor(int r,
                                                                 int g,
                                                                 int b)
        Get the named color that has exactly the given RGB color value or null if no such named color exists.
        Parameters:
        r - the red component of the color (0 - 255)
        g - the green component of the color (0 - 255)
        b - the blue component of the color (0 - 255)
        Returns:
        an Optional<String> that either contains the name of the color with the exact same color value or nothing if no such named color exists

      • getNamedColor

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getNamedColor(java.lang.String hexString)
        Get the color name of the color that is exactly equal to the given hex color value (as a 6-digit hex String).
        Parameters:
        hexString - the String containing 6 hex-digits representing a color value ("000000" to "FFFFFF")
        Returns:
        an Optional<String> that either contains the name of the color with the exact same color value or nothing if no such named color exists

      • calculateColorDistSq

        public static double calculateColorDistSq(javafx.scene.paint.Color color0,
                                          javafx.scene.paint.Color color1)
        Calculates the distance between two Colors.
        Parameters:
        color0 - the first color
        color1 - the second color
        Returns:
        the distance between the two colors
